EnemyInfo.Name: Ceres Door
EnemyInfo.Description: Door sprites found in Ceres that open when samus approaches it.

Property.Name: Type
Property.Description: Type of door. The Escape version of the doors lock during the Ceres escape, but they don't render when they lock. The "Exploding Overlay" can be used together with the Escape door to have the visuals, but it only works in Mode 7.
